summary: Implements a specialized diffusion pipeline that performs image inpainting using the Stable Diffusion XL model enhanced with Patch Attention Guidance (PAG). The class integrates support for LoRA adapters, textual inversion, IP‑Adapter, and various callbacks, handling preprocessing, latent management, and the diffusion schedule to produce edited images.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to generate high‑quality edited images by seamlessly applying advanced diffusion techniques with additional guidance, facilitating applications such as photo retouching, creative image synthesis, and visual content production.
